description:
The Digimon Phelesmon, has promised to make the new kid Makoto popular.  Phelesmon is hypnotizing the students and it’s causing him to grow stronger.  With Tagiru and Taiki the only ones not hypnotized, are they strong enough to stop him?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tomodachi Hoshii? Phelesmon Akuma no Yakusoku
You Want Friends? Phelesmon, the Devil`s Promise
友だち欲しい? フェレスモン悪魔の約束
